sub_title: Client Relations Manager | Communication | Team Lead | Project Manager
summary:
INTRODUCTION 
🔸I have 20 years of experience working with people of different ages and segments, in various directions. I have understanding and tolerance for another person. My main talent is to harmonize the processes of interaction with clients and employees, business processes, and space in general.

🔸For more than 15 years I have been implementing and managing projects in the field of customer service and sales (banking, training services, the last 3 years - working with English-speaking clients). I effectively manage the product and the team from the implementation of the concept to the result.
✔️ I have a work permit in the Netherlands
✔️ I am improving my English and have started learning Dutch. And I do my best to ensure that my experience and skills bring the maximum benefit to your company.

MAIN AREAS OF EXPERTISE 

Client Relations Manager, Communication, Team Leader, Project Manager, Analytics, Insights, Optimization, Training and Development 

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

🔸20+ Experience in communication and work with clients: training clients in computer skills, banking customer service, attracting clients for service, concluding contracts, online customer support. 1 year of experience working with children.

🔸Team management experience: 
2.5 years - Head of Sales and Customer Care at the International Online Academy. 12 years - head of various departments in the banking sector. My maximum functional subordination was up to 70 employees in the team.

🔸Streamlining and optimization: 
Development and creation of business processes, implementation of the CPM system, Analytics, key decisions

🔸International experience: 
Online customer support from all over the world (in English), including the US, Arab countries, Europe and Asia. Individual approach to each client

🔸Creative approach to work, Organizational skills: while working in a bank, I took an active part in the life of the team, I have experience in organizing events of various levels - both business and entertainment (team day)

🔸Soft skills:
communicator, energetic, optimistic, team player, motivator, finder of solutions, harmonies

🔸Hobbies: Yoga (I'm currently training as a yoga teacher), dancing, drawing, singing, making videos. Self-development and self-knowledge

courses.name: Training on the launch and development of educational projects from layb.io

profile_positions.description:
I implemented the work of the Sales and Customer Care Department in the online Kyiv International Culinary Academy (English speaking clients). Developed and implemented Business Processes for high-quality and efficient work of this department. In addition, I was engaged in operational tasks for Planning and streamlining current Business processes at the Academy.

My main functions included:
- Ensuring uninterrupted, high-quality and efficient work of the sales department and customer care.
- Search and selection of personnel. Conducting interviews, monitoring the implementation of test tasks. Internship, employee training
- Monthly analysis of the Academy's sales in the context of various categories and parameters.
-  Monthly planning of the work of the Academy
-  Monitoring the implementation of the plan, the necessary adjustments to ensure the implementation of the sales plan
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Sales and Client Care

profile_positions.description:
For 13 years I have been developed new projects and directions in the middle office of PrivatBank - one of largest bank in Ukraine. I worked with different segments of clients: from children to pensioners, from individuals to VIP-level legal entities. My career has been from the position of Legal Entity Lending Manager to Team Lead Manager of Medium Business, (I had up to 70 employees in my functional department).

Functions performed:

- Organization of work in the Eastern Regional Office of PrivatBank to achieve the targets for the sale of banking products
- Search and selection of personnel. Conducting interviews, monitoring the implementation of test tasks. Internship, Conducting training sessions for employees 
- Interaction with other departments of the Bank
- Attracting and servicing clients of various levels (individuals, legal entities, VIP-clients) through meetings, calls, "round tables"
- Analyzing the activities and financial performance of clients, monitoring loans repayment
profile_positions.title: Small and Medium Business Team Lead Manager

profile_positions.description: Organization of the opening of the branch "from scratch". Recruitment, active marketing to attract customers, household part. The Branch became successful in the first year of operation.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader of Branch group A

profile_positions.description: Direction - acquiring & lending in Trading enterprises
profile_positions.title: Team leader of the "Business of work with trading enterprises"

profile_positions.description: Organization of the process of teaching children 6-16 years of financial literacy. Organization of the formation of the Bank's agent network. Conducting training sessions for children and for the Bank's Agents.
profile_positions.title: Team leader in the direction of "JuniorBank" and "Agent Network"

profile_positions.description: Development of a New Direction in the Bank. Building business processes in the regional Directorate. Throughout my entire work in this area, I have been ranked at the forefront of key indicators.
profile_positions.title: Team leader of the direction "Personal lending to individuals"

profile_positions.description: Attracting clients for lending, analyzing the activities and financial performance of clients, monitoring loan repayment. Launch of a new lending point. Training and training of new employees.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Lending Manager

profile_positions.description:
My students found jobs after their studies and this is my best achievement in this position.
My functions included:
Teaching students graphic programs: Photoshop, Corel Draw, as well as basic knowledge of working with a computer and office programs: Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Power Point.
Drawing up a convenient training program, an understandable explanation of the topic to students, mentoring in practical tasks, inspiration and giving confidence.
profile_positions.title: Computer Graphics Teacher

volunteer_experiences.description: At the beginning of the war in Ukraine, I helped the residents of the city of Kramatorsk find housing in a calmer region (I was looking for people who are ready to provide their homes for the accommodation of refugees and negotiated the accommodation of refugees)

I took part in the ethno-cultural festival "Syaivo" and conducted morning master classes for the participants of the festival on the yogic dance Kaoshiki - a dance-meditation that expands consciousness.
